alert.note: Alert for Central Chippewa; Western Chippewa (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 09 at 10:56AM EST until January 10 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow and blowing snow expected. Snow accumulations of 5 to 9 inches are expected by Monday morning with an additional 2 to 5 inches by Monday evening, bringing storm total snow accumulations 7 to 14 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph will lead to areas of blowing snow. * WHERE...Western Chippewa and Central Chippewa Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility to near whiteout at times. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning or evening commutes. Cold wind chills as low as 15 below zero could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
